titleStmt.title: Consolations addres'd to a friend upon the death of his excellent and pious consort. Applicable also to a resentment of the death of our late gracious and incomparable Queen. By Theophilus Dorrington.
titleStmt.author: Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wyat at the Rose in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the Rose in St. Paul's Church-yard
